title: Dance on a May Day
creator_credit: John G. Avildsen and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Focuses on professional dancer Jacques d’Amboise, who founded the National Dance Institute for the purpose of introducing dance to boys. Observes d’Amboise and his students in practice sessions, as well as in performance at New York’s Lincoln Center.
creator_credit_for_label: John G. Avildsen and Learning Corporation of America
